title: IT Service Application/Program Manager
summary: At Apple, new ideas have a way of becoming extraordinary products, services, and customer experiences very quickly.
description: Participate in the full life cycle management of organization related corporate IT application assets to ensure the application systems can provide secure, stable and high-quality service to support business needs.
preferred_qualifications: Very strong communication skill. Can use “business language” as well as “technology language” to communicate with out barrier among different stakeholders.
education_experience: Bachelor degree and major in Science or Engineering, software related. Equivalent experience above computer science or related field.
